finalproject.ece558.edu.pdx.ece.brailleblackjack

Class LearnBrailleFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • finalproject.ece558.edu.pdx.ece.brailleblackjack.LearnBrailleFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class LearnBrailleFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    This fragment class represent a card being used in the Learn Braille Section of the app. It takes a specific page (image/card of what to show like braille numbers) builds and inflates it into view
